title: ranked during preseason
body: so i climbed from gold 5 to plat 5 during preseason, does that mean i have a higher chance at getting into high gold/low plat after playing my placement  matches next season (asssuming i do well) or will i end up in high silver/low gold?

replies.body: You'll still need to do your placements as always, but your previous rank does still hold a bit of weight for the next season!
